generated.css: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto:wght@400;500;700;900&display=swap");body{margin:0}.grid{display:grid;grid-template-rows:3.5em 1fr 3.5em;grid-template-areas:"Header Header Header" "Main Main Main" "Footer Footer Footer";height:100vh}header{grid-area:Header;-webkit-box-shadow:0 2px 41px -5px rgba(0,0,0,.4);-moz-box-shadow:0 2px 41px -5px rgba(0,0,0,.4);box-shadow:0 2px 41px -5px rgba(0,0,0,.4)}main{grid-area:Main}main .todoButton{margin-left:35%;margin-top:5em;width:7em;height:1.9em;background-color:transparent;border:1px solid #000;font-family:Roboto,sans-serif;font-size:30px}footer{grid-area:Footer}header nav{margin-left:1.4em;margin-top:-.5em}.title a{font-family:Roboto,sans-serif;font-weight:900;font-size:30px;text-decoration:none;color:#000}.title a:hover{color:#2f4f4f;transition:.5s;cursor:pointer}.modalTodo form button:hover{background-color:#61d195;transition:.5s;cursor:pointer}.todoButton:hover{transition:.7s;background-color:#00ab6f;cursor:cell}.closBtn:hover{cursor:pointer}.mainModal .create:hover{transition:.6s;background-color:#61d195;cursor:pointer}.modalTodo{z-index:9;position:absolute;top:50%;left:50%;margin-right:-50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%);background-color:#fff;width:340px;height:395px;border-radius:10px;-webkit-box-shadow:0 0 49px -24px rgba(0,0,0,.6);-moz-box-shadow:0 0 49px -24px rgba(0,0,0,.6);box-shadow:0 0 49px -24px rgba(0,0,0,.6)}.mainModal{z-index:3;position:fixed;width:100%;height:100%;backdrop-filter:blur(3px);-webkit-backdrop-filter:blur(3px);display:none}.mainModal .charLeft{display:flex;flex-direction:row}.charLeft p:nth-child(2),.charLeft p:nth-child(3){color:#555}#header{display:flex;flex-direction:row;align-items:center;gap:170px;border-bottom:1px solid #b6b6b6}#header h3{margin-left:15px;font-family:Roboto,sans-serif;font-weight:500;font-size:15px;color:#555}#header span{padding-left:60px;font-size:25px;color:#b6b6b6}.modalTodo form{display:flex;flex-direction:column}.modalTodo form input{height:35px;width:300px;border-radius:10px;border:1px solid #b6b6b6;margin-left:1.25em;margin-bottom:.6em;font-family:Roboto,sans-serif}.modalTodo form p{font-family:Roboto,sans-serif;display:flex;margin-bottom:.5em;margin-left:1.56em;font-size:13px}.modalTodo form .create{background-color:#00ab6f;border:none;border-radius:10px;width:13em;height:3em;font-family:Roboto,sans-serif;font-weight:600;font-size:15px;margin-left:4.7em;margin-top:13px}.cards{margin-top:7em;margin-left:35%;display:flex;flex-direction:row;gap:35px}.card{width:300px;height:160px;background-color:#fff;border-radius:10px;-webkit-box-shadow:0 0 15px -1px rgba(111,207,252,.35);-moz-box-shadow:0 0 15px -1px rgba(111,207,252,.35);box-shadow:0 0 15px -1px rgba(111,207,252,.35)}.card h3{margin-left:.7em;padding-top:10px;font-weight:500}.card h3,.card p{font-family:Roboto,sans-serif}.card p{margin-left:.8em;font-weight:300;color:#555;margin-top:-10px}.card .removeC{background-color:#ef3340}.card .completeC{background-color:#56d4c2}.card input{width:100px;height:27px;border-radius:6px;border:none;margin-left:10px;font-family:Roboto,sans-serif;font-weight:500}.completedTodos{position:static;left:50%;margin-left:35%;margin-top:60px}.completedTodos h2{font-family:Roboto,sans-serif;margin-bottom:80px}.compHead{display:flex;flex-direction:row;width:54em;height:2em;background-color:#d3d3d3;align-items:center;gap:174px}.compHead h3{color:#18181b;margin-left:30px;font-size:15px;font-family:Roboto,sans-serif}.TodosInfo{display:grid;grid-template-columns:865px;grid-auto-rows:20px;grid-row-gap:25px}.completedInfo{grid-column:1/2;align-items:center}.completedInfo ul{display:flex;list-style-type:none;flex-wrap:wrap;justify-content:space-between;margin:0;padding:0;max-width:100%;overflow:hidden;border-bottom:1px solid #bcbcbc}.completedInfo ul li p{font-family:Roboto,sans-serif;color:#bcbcbc}#checkDate{margin-top:10px;width:20px;height:20px;border:5px solid #000}.date{display:flex;flex-direction:row;gap:20px;margin-left:43%}.date p{font-family:Roboto,sans-serif;margin-top:10px}
